participant_1.background:
My dolls help me cope with the stress of my job.
my wife is a college professor.
i am currently looking for a job in baltimore.
I am still trying to lose weight.
I love Halloween, as I enjoy dressing up and getting into the spooky spirit.

participant_2.background:
I'm trying to eat healthier, but my boyfriend loves fast food.
I'm a dentist because I love helping people, but my heart belongs to my parents and sweets.
I'm glad I have such fond memories of fishing with my dad.
I wake up in a different hotel every morning, and I spend my day exploring new places and meeting new people
i dream of playing music for a living.

content.text: Hello! I'm looking for someone to chat with about Halloween.
Hello! Halloween is so much fun. I love dressing up and getting into the spooky spirit.
Me too! I have a whole collection of Halloween dolls that I love to decorate with.
That sounds amazing! I love dolls, but I don't have any Halloween ones.
You should get some! They're so much fun to collect.
Maybe I will! I'm always looking for ways to add more Halloween to my life.
That's great! I'm sure you'd love having some Halloween dolls.
I think I would too. I love the spooky and creepy stuff.
Me too! That's why I love Halloween so much.
I love going to haunted houses and watching scary movies.
Those are both great traditions! I love haunted houses too.
Me too! They're so much fun.
I'm glad we both like Halloween! It's the best holiday.
I agree! It's the best time of year
